name: New Cartographies - ONE COPY LEFT!
description:
*LAST COPY LEFT* 

Last year I ran a subscription album for riverrun fans, which went something like this: I would make one riverrun track per month, send it out as an mp3, and then provide a completed album at the end of the year, along with various other goodies. 

The tracks were made for this little club and aren't really available anywhere else.

However, due to minimum order requirements with the CD manufacturers, I am able to offer three copies of this album on a first-come, first served basis. 

This is literally the only chance to own this album on CD! :)

name: A Single Man (CD)
description:
I've been doing solo shows for a number of years now, normally when it's too impractical to get a band together for a particular gig. These aren't typical "acoustic" sets exactly, as I use an electric guitar and a modulation delay pedal, so the result is something that's stripped down but that also still has a nice atmospheric, shoegazey aspect to it. 

I've finally gotten to the point where I feel that the shows are something unique and interesting, and the kind comments I've received from people (including the Cocteau Twins Robin Guthrie!) about them have made me think that it might be worth making a record that reflected this aspect of my work. 

Accordingly, I'm pleased to announce that I've recorded an album called "A Single Man" (the title is from a Christopher Isherwood novel) which contains studio recordings done in this style. 

The album includes some exclusive songs which I've only ever performed in this format and which won't be released anywhere else, including "Amsterdam", "Fragments Shored (Lundy Island)", Limerick", and "Drowning Song". 

There are also stripped-down renditions of Daniel Land & The Modern Painters songs including "Benjamin's Room", "Lostening" and "Sleeping With The Past" and solo versions of the tracks "Cinderella City" and "The Sweetest Lover", the full versions of which will be on my next 'proper' album.

Here is the full tracklisting:

1. Echo & Narcissus 
2. Amsterdam*
3. Benjamin's Room
4. Lostening
5. Cinderella City*
6. Limerick*
7. The Sweetest Lover*
8. Mistress* 
9. Drowning Song*
10. Sleeping With The Past
11. Fragments Shored (Lundy Island)*

*Previously unreleased in any form.
